meta.article_title: January 25, 2016 - Should You Develop Your Forehand Push?

should_you_develop_your_forehand_push.probleme: Should You Develop Your Forehand Push?

debutant.description: Push short, push quick and long, go for angles, heavy spin, etc. - all sorts of variations.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Push forehand to forehand with a partner
exercices_complementaires.description: Start the drill by pushing against a short backspin, and then continue the drill/rally with other shots.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Push forehand to backhand where both players push short - but the first time a player pushes long (by mistake), you loop.
exercices_complementaires.description: Develops your short push, develops your loop, and best of all, it develops your judgment on whether a ball is long or short.
